question: 1. The execution of a loop typically starts with:

answers.d: No looping peocess check condition at the end

question: 6. A continue statement causes execution to skip to:

answers.b: the first statement after the loop

answers.d: the next iteration of the loop

9. Which looping process is best used when the number of iterations is known?
10.  Which of the following is not an infinite loop.

answers.b: for( int i =1; i < 10 ; i--) printf('Hello World');
answers.c: for(int i =1; i<100; i++) printf('Hello World');
